com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.makelangeloRobot.loadAndSave

Class DXFBucketGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.makelangeloRobot.loadAndSave.DXFBucketGrid

  • public class DXFBucketGrid
extends Object
    Used by LoadDXF2. A grid of DXFBuckets and convenience methods to access the buckets and their contents.
    Author:
    Dan Royer

                     org.kabeja.dxf.helpers.Point topLeft,

        Parameters:
        cellsWide - a value greater than zero.
        cellsHigh - a value greater than zero.
        topLeft - smallest X and smallest Y value
        bottomRight - largest X and largest Y value

      • findNonEmptyBucket

        protected DXFBucket findNonEmptyBucket(org.kabeja.dxf.helpers.Point p,
                                       double epsilon)
        Find the non-empty bucket nearest to point p. If p is null, pick the first non-empty bucket.
        Parameters:
        p - the point to test
        epsilon - the margin of error?
        Returns:
        the selected bucket
